header.content: Universal Testing Framework for SPL Platform - Provides quality gates and systematic API validation.
{bold Core Operations}: run, suite, assert, coverage
{bold Test Discovery}: Auto-discovers tests in module/tests/ folders
{bold SPL Integration}: Full workspace and debug output integration

value.name: batch
value.description: JSON array of batch test operations for pipeline execution

value.name: mode
value.description: Test operation mode (run, suite, assert, coverage)

value.name: module
value.description: Target module for testing (e.g., gp/fs, gp/fs/read)

value.name: debug
value.description: Enable detailed debug output during test execution

value.name: discover
value.description: Auto-discover and run all tests in specified app/module

value.name: app
value.description: Target app for test discovery (e.g., gp, spl)

value.name: filter
value.description: Filter test cases by name pattern

value.name: failfast
value.description: Stop execution on first test failure

value.name: isolated
value.description: Run tests in isolated workspace environments
